item.title: 英国全国房屋价格指数（Nationwide）称英国 5 月房价意外上涨
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，5 月份英国房价意外上涨，这表明在购房者减税政策到期后，住房需求依然保持弹性。【原文：UK house prices unexpectedly rose in May, in a sign that demand for housing remains resilient following the expiry of a tax break for buyers, according to one of Britain’s largest mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 拉托斯寻求从北欧建筑公司首次公开募股中获得 1.6 亿美元资金
item.description: Sentia AS 是 Ratos AB 旗下的一家建筑公司，在瑞典和挪威都有项目，该公司在奥斯陆提交了首次公开募股申请，希望募集多达 16 亿克朗（1.6 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Sentia AS, a construction company owned by Ratos AB with projects in Sweden and Norway, filed for an initial public offering in Oslo where it hopes to raise as much as 1.6 billion kroner ($160 million).】

item.title: 汤姆-克鲁斯的最后一部《碟中谍》荣登中国票房榜榜首
item.description: 汤姆-克鲁斯的电影在中国重回榜首。不可能的任务不可能的任务--终极审判》无视华盛顿和北京之间的贸易和地缘政治紧张局势，创下了今年美国电影在中国的最大开画纪录。【原文：Tom Cruise’s film is back on top in China. Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning posted the biggest opening for a US film in the country this year, defying trade and geopolitical tensions between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 挪威将无人机检查海上石油平台提升到新水平
item.description: 挪威的一个大型油田正在将该行业使用无人机进行安全检查的做法推向一个新的高度，该油田永久性地安装了一架飞机，可在岸上进行远程操作。【原文：A major Norwegian oil field is taking the industry’s use of drones for safety inspections to a new level, with a permanently installed aircraft that’s operated remotely from the shore.】

item.title: 普京的央行行长面临削减创纪录高利率的压力
item.description: 俄罗斯央行行长曾因在乌克兰入侵后帮助挽救国家经济而受到称赞，但他正面临着越来越大的压力，要求他扭转借贷成本创历史新高的趋势，因为人们担心借贷成本会给企业带来损失。【原文：The Bank of Russia’s governor, who was praised for helping save the country’s economy after the invasion of Ukraine, is facing mounting pressure to reverse course on record-high borrowing costs amid worries over their toll on business.】

item.title: 贸易担忧扰动市场，富时 100 指数将跑赢大盘
特朗普采取行动解除拜登时代对北极石油钻探的限制
item.description: 特朗普政府正着手废除拜登时代阻止在阿拉斯加大部分巨大石油储备区进行石油钻探的禁令。【原文：The Trump administration is moving to repeal Biden-era curbs blocking oil drilling across most of the mammoth petroleum reserve in Alaska that’s home to an estimated 8.7 billion barrels of recoverable oil.】

item.title: 瑞典 5 月破产率在消费低迷中走高
item.description: 由于关税的不确定性影响了消费者的消费意愿，瑞典的破产数量继续攀升。【原文：The number of bankruptcies in Sweden continues to tick higher as the uncertainty surrounding tariffs weighs on consumers’ willingness to spend.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性导致 AMRO 下调香港 2025 年经济增长展望
item.description: 一个地区性组织下调了香港的经济增长前景，敦促香港实现经济和贸易伙伴多元化，以抵御日益严重的保护主义。【原文：Hong Kong’s growth outlook was cut by a regional organization, which urged the city to diversify its economy and trading partners to counter growing protectionism.】

item.title: 广告毁了社交媒体。现在，它们将来到人工智能领域。
item.description:
聊天机器人正在转向广告模式，并对眼球进行优化，就像社交媒体所做的那样。还记得结果如何吗？【原文：

Chatbots are pivoting to the ad model and optimizing for eyeballs, just like social media did. Remember how that turned out?

】

item.title: 欧洲央行将进行最后一次宽松降息，贸易加剧通胀不和
item.description: 欧洲中央银行即将最后一次降低利率，在此之前，日益复杂的通胀前景有可能使内部分歧凸显出来。【原文：The European Central Bank is about to lower interest rates for the final time before an increasingly complicated inflation outlook risks bringing internal divisions to the fore.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势下航空业下调利润预期
item.description: 全球领先的航空协会表示，在贸易关系日益紧张和消费者信心下降的情况下，全球航空业今年的总收入将达到 360 亿美元，比 12 月份发布的最新预测有所下调。【原文：The global airline industry stands to earn a collective $36 billion this year, a downward revision from the most recent prediction issued in December amid growing trade tensions and a drop in consumer confidence, the leading aviation association said.】

item.title: 菲律宾因定价过高下令关闭亚航 MOVE 航班
item.description: 在被投诉非法收取高额票价后，菲律宾已下令亚航数字平台停止在该国销售机票。【原文：The Philippines has ordered AirAsia’s digital platform to stop selling airline tickets in the country following complaints it charged illegally high fares.】

item.title: 菲律宾关注印度和泰国大米以减少对越南的依赖
item.description: 菲律宾是世界上最大的大米进口国，它计划将目光投向其主要供应商越南以外的地区，以确保国内稳定的供应和有竞争力的价格。【原文：The Philippines, the world’s top rice importer, plans to look beyond its dominant supplier, Vietnam, to ensure steady supplies and competitive prices at home.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为欧佩克+再加息三次将推动布伦特原油走低
item.description: 摩根士丹利认为，"欧佩克+"将继续恢复生产三个月，这将有助于推动油价走低。【原文：OPEC+ is set to continue returning production for another three months, which will help drive oil prices lower, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 新世界的困境在债券利息延迟的冲击下进一步恶化
item.description: 香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developer New World Development Co. is sliding deeper into distress after jolting investors by delaying interest payments on some bonds, marking the latest flashpoint in a years-long crisis in China’s property market.】

item.title: 日本将召开部长级会议解决大米供应问题
item.description: 日本首相石破茂周一在国会表示，日本最早将于本周召开一次部长级会议，以解决大米供应问题。【原文：Japan will set up a minister-level meeting as early as this week to address the supply of rice, Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said in parliament on Monday, as the government seeks to stabilize the price of the nation’s staple grain and quell public anger ahead of a summer election.】

item.title: 对冲基金削减日元看涨押注，资产管理公司立场坚定
item.description: 即使资产管理公司转而看好日元，杠杆基金也减少了看涨日元的押注，这凸显了日元前景的不确定性。【原文：Leveraged funds reduced their bullish yen bets even as asset managers turned more positive, underscoring uncertainty over the Japanese currency’s outlook.】

item.title: 特朗普计划提高钢铁税，铁矿石创一个月新低
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统表示将加倍征收钢铝关税以保护美国工人之后，铁矿石与股市一起跌至 5 月初以来的最低水平。【原文：Iron ore fell to its lowest level since early May alongside equity markets after President Donald Trump said he would double tariffs on steel and aluminum to help protect American workers.】

item.title: 中国煤炭行业有一个肮脏的大秘密
item.description:
一个不起眼的行业角落已达到了巨大的规模，但却几乎未引起人们的注意。【原文：

Largely unnoticed, an obscure corner of the trade has reached gargantuan proportions. 

】

item.title: 中国股票在分析师押注统计中胜过印度同类股票
item.description: 根据分析师的估计，投资者购买中国股票的收益要高于印度股票。【原文：Investors have more to gain from buying Chinese shares than those in India, according to a tally of analysts’ estimates.】

item.title: 印度经济增长意外利好基建股和消费股
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 贸易战冲击亚洲工厂，出口和生产下滑
item.description: 由于美国关税和贸易不确定性削弱了需求，5 月份亚洲多个国家的制造业活动疲软。【原文：Manufacturing activity across several Asian nations weakened in May as US tariffs and trade uncertainty eroded demand.】

item.title: 美国商会会长称中国并未阻止稀土出口
item.description: 据一个美国企业游说团体称，在美国高官抱怨中国没有按照承诺消除壁垒之后，中国在过去一周里已慢慢放松了对稀土出口的控制。【原文：China has been slowly loosening the grip on its exports of rare earths over the past week, according to a lobby group for American businesses, after top US officials complained it hadn’t been removing barriers as promised.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博称中美贸易谈判对整个亚洲都很重要
item.description: 韩国银行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）表示，中美贸易谈判的结果将对亚洲所有经济体产生影响，这凸显了其超越双边层面的重要性。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong said the outcome of trade negotiations between the US and China will have an impact for all of Asia’s economies, highlighting their significance beyond the bilateral level.】

item.title: 据报道，日本赤泽将于本周返回美国
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世正在考虑本周返回美国进行新一轮贸易谈判，因为人们对最早于本月达成协议的期望越来越高。【原文：Japan’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa is considering returning to the US for another round of trade negotiations this week as expectations mount for a deal as early as this month.】

item.title: 与美国的新贸易摩擦引发中国股市下跌
item.description: 由于中美贸易紧张局势加剧，市场情绪受到冲击，周一在香港交易的中国股票下跌。【原文：Chinese shares traded in Hong Kong fell on Monday, as heightened US-China trade tensions jolted market sentiment.】

item.title: 中国指责美国违反贸易休战，誓言做出坚决回应
item.description: 中国指责美国违反了双方最近达成的贸易协议，并誓言采取措施捍卫自己的利益，这使得唐纳德-特朗普希望立即召集领导层进一步开展双边会谈的前景变得暗淡。【原文：China accused the US of violating their recent trade deal and vowed to take measures to defend its interests, dimming the prospect of an immediate leadership call that Donald Trump wants to have to further bilateral talks.】

item.title: 一本价值 840 亿美元的短篇小说给印度卢比带来压力
item.description: 据分析师称，印度卢比是本季度亚洲新兴市场表现最差的货币，并可能继续落后于其他国家，因为印度央行希望避免外汇储备枯竭。【原文：The Indian rupee is emerging Asia’s worst performer this quarter and may continue to lag peers as the central bank aims to avert a depletion in its foreign-exchange reserves, according to analysts.】
